query.text: declare @c_acc varchar(4000), @d_acc varchar(4000), @title nvarchar(1024), @color1 char(7), @color2 char(7) select @c_acc = c_acc, @d_acc = d_acc from biform where form_id = '001' select @color1 = mau from dbcolor where id = 1 select @color2 = mau from dbcolor where id = 2 select @title = case when @@language = 'V' then ten_vung else ten_vung2 end from dbfield where field_id = 'C001' exec ds_Dashboard001 'C001', '013', '', @c_acc, @d_acc, @@language, @@userID, @@admin select filter_time = '013', filter_unit = '', filter_type = 'bar', @title as title, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Doanh thu' else N'Revenue' end as legend1, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chi phí' else N'Expense' end as legend2, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đơn vị tính: VNĐ' else N'Unit of Measure: VND' end as subtitle, case when @@language = 'V' then N'Không có dữ liệu!' else N'No Data!' end as defaultData, color1 = @color1, color2 = @color2

declare @c_acc varchar(4000), @d_acc varchar(4000), @title nvarchar(1024), @color1 char(7), @color2 char(7) select @c_acc = c_acc, @d_acc = d_acc from biform where form_id = '001' select @color1 = mau from dbcolor where id = 1 select @color2 = mau from dbcolor where id = 2 select @title = case when @@language = 'V' then ten_vung else ten_vung2 end from dbfield where field_id = 'C001' exec ds_Dashboard001 'C001', @@$time, @@$unit, @c_acc, @d_acc, @@language, @@userID, @@admin select filter_time = @@$time, filter_unit = @@$unit, filter_type = 'bar', @title as title, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Doanh thu' else N'Revenue' end as legend1, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chi phí' else N'Expense' end as legend2, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đơn vị tính: VNĐ' else N'Unit of Measure: VND' end as subtitle, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Không có dữ liệu!' else N'No Data!' end as defaultData, color1 = @color1, color2 = @color2
